title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Frustrating debate: Trump vs. Biden and Wallace. Trump wanted to debate but Chris Wallace wanted to micromanage the meaningless rules. The future of the country is at stake and we got a debate dominated by the moderator. Trump saved Biden from melting down multiple times because he was so eager to correct his lies. Latest Hillary scandal: She cooked up the whole Trump-Russia collusion narrative. Trump asked to denounce white supremacists again, Biden not asked about any of the racist things he's said. Millennial women think Trump is a bully. NFL postpones Steelers-Titans after Titans COVID outbreak. Caller points out that Trump should be angry, after all of these people tried to take him out. Wallace pledged not to fact-check during debate, broke pledge. Biden contradicted his base on many issues, but it went unnoticed. Wallace debated Trump on climate. Trump had a strategy to let Biden implode, but he undermined it by responding to every Biden lie. Telemundo snap poll showing Trump winning debate stuns media.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Plugs wants them to cut off Trump's mic in the next debate. Dems, media beg Biden not to debate again. If Trump lost, why don't they want more debates. Trump hammered the left last night and it glues his base to him. Biden says Antifa is an "idea" not an organization. Pollster Lee Smith says the undecideds were so turned off by the debate they won't vote. This is a base election and Biden can't win a base election because there's no enthusiasm for Biden. Telemundo poll. Nate Silver gives Biden a 75-80% chance of winning. Chris Wallace.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Debate commission says it will change the rules to provide better "tools" to control the debates. Does that mean Chris Wallace was an insufficient tool? Former debate moderator Carole Simpson on controlling Ross Perot. The moderator is not the reason people watch debates. Breaking down Trump's answer on white supremacist, Proud Boys. Trump denounced them last night and has denounced them in the past. Lanny Davis tweet: Blue staters want to succeed. Caller asks if it's time for America to get a divorce.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
